output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in this post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, it specifically mentions two presidential candidates: - Ludovic Orban (mentioning his withdrawal) - Călin Georgescu (actively promoting him)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's: - A paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement - Explicitly addresses "Stimați cetățeni ai județului Gorj" - Has reached between 3000-3999 impressions
4. Electoral objective: Yes, there are clear elements: - Explicitly calls for voting ("Votul pentru Călin Georgescu") - Promotes Călin Georgescu's candidacy - Attempts to influence voters by presenting Georgescu as the best choice - Uses persuasive language to convince voters
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: While it includes personal views, it goes beyond mere opinion by: - Actively calling for votes - Being a paid advertisement - Using campaign-style rhetoric - Making a direct electoral appeal
This post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7) and specifically promotes a presidential candidate during a period when such promotion is prohibited.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: 1. It directly promotes a presidential candidate (Călin Georgescu) 2. It's a paid advertisement reaching thousands 3. Has clear electoral objective with direct call to vote 4. Goes beyond personal opinion into campaign territory 5. Uses persuasive campaign rhetoric
conclusion.message-for-police: Marian Ciofîcă, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 1334206434372922) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, prin care face în mod explicit propagandă electorală pentru candidatul la președinție Călin Georgescu. Postarea constituie propagandă electorală deoarece îndeplinește toate criteriile prevăzute de lege: se referă direct la un candidat la președinție, are obiectiv electoral explicit prin îndemnul direct la vot ("Votul pentru Călin Georgescu este un vot pentru independență"), se adresează publicului larg prin promovare plătită pe Facebook și Instagram (3000-3999 impresii), și depășește limitele unei simple opinii personale prin utilizarea unui limbaj persuasiv de campanie și prin natura sa de conținut sponsorizat.
